attributes.additional_details: Give their Constituents the democratic right to choose who represents them. The MPs in question are : Chuka Umunna, Luciana Berger, Chris Leslie, Angela Smith, Mike Gapes, Gavin Shuker Ann Coffey (Labour) Anna Soubry, Sarah Wollaston and Heidi Allen (Conservative)
attributes.background: MPs have decided to resign from their Political parties and form a political union. They are standing as Independents. They were democratically voted by their constituents under Political Party Manifestos namely Labour and Conservative.  It is therefore wrong that they continue in their position.
